page.title: 04Playground Games
page.content: These are some of the games which children play for entertainment in the playgrounds of Bedgrove First and Middle Schools and Weston Turville Combined School. " Bus 21 "is a playground game.This is played when one person is it.They have to count to 200 in fives slowly and when they are counting the rest of the children go and hide.Then when the person who is it has finished counting he looks around and if he sees anyone who is hiding,he shouts "Bus 21" I see you.This carries on until everybody has been seen,then the first person that is seen is it.At Weston Turville School we play a similar game called "Bonio-Home".
